nodes.text: CryonCorp was a company that manufactured various weapon attachments. During the Galactic Civil War, available CryonCorp products included the "Heads-Up" Scanner Suite and PL-1 "Second Sight" Scope, both models of weapon attachment.

CryonCorp was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Cracken's Rebel Field Guide: Scanners, an article published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 4 in 1994.
